text: Jeremi Cockram is a Welsh actor best known for playing the character of Sion White in the Welsh-language soap Pobol y Cwm. Cockram was a student at Ysgol Gyfun Rhydfelen, a Welsh language secondary school near Pontypridd. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Welsh male television actors Category:Welsh-speaking actors Category:People educated at Ysgol Gyfun Garth Olwg
title: Jeremi Cockram
